forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 70. West southwest wind 13 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco this afternoon, the sun bathes the city in a warm glow, ushering in a high temperature around 70 degrees. The breezy west-southwest winds whisper through the streets, hinting at an invigorating day ahead, though the occasional gust might ruffle those unprepared for nature’s flirtations. The sky unfolds with clarity; a few wispy clouds dance above, merely playful reminders of the marine layer that persists just beyond the horizon, likely tucked away between the Golden Gate and the Pacific, preserving the city’s unique personality. 

As evening approaches, expect the gentle embrace of partly cloudy skies, with temperatures settling around 56 degrees. A light jacket will serve well to ward off the evening chill, should you decide to take a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero or perhaps enjoy a quiet moment at one of the local cafés, where the air is filled with the aroma of freshly brewed coffee mingling with the salt of the sea. Take advantage of the pleasant day by wandering through the heart of the city or visiting a quaint bookstore, letting the rhythm of life in San Francisco coax you into its vibrant embrace.
